entries.text:
A memory of Wolf's original form.
Concentrate on this memory at a Sculptor's Idol to revert the Wolf to his original appearance.
Naturally, Wolf's original form is also his best-fitting one.

Memories left behind by another. Concentrate on these inmost regrets or obsessions at a Sculptor's Idol to change the Wolf's appearance. Has no effect on ability.
Memory of Shura told via Ashina folksong: "Fields of bodies, mountains of dead Down Dragonspring river, our country bled A fiery god, demon wolf in red."

Memories left behind by another. Concentrate on these inmost regrets or obsessions at a Sculptor's Idol to change the Wolf's appearance. Has no effect on ability.
The memory of a shinobi that once served Ashina. It is accompanied by a debt of gratitude; to the one who took his arm and graced him with the name Sekijo.

Memories left behind by another. Concentrate on these inmost regrets or obsessions at a Sculptor's Idol to change the Wolf's appearance. Has no effect on ability.
The memory of the Tengu of Ashina. It is accompanied by a strong desire. If you see a rat, it must be killed.
